Posts.Content: If you or someone you know has breast cancer watch these slide presentations. These are mainstream doctors presenting to other doctors new therapies that could repalce the standard care. these are rather large files but worth every minute. http://www.facs.org/spring_meeting/2...14klimberg.pdf http://www.facs.org/spring_meeting/2003/gs06dowlat.pdf If these interest you.. let me know I can get more info.
Posts.Title: ACS presentations on breast cancer treatments

Posts.Content: Ladies, save your breasts and your health. Now there is a Dr. in the USA treating cancer with LASER. This treatment kills the tumors instantly without surgery. This is FDA approved. learn more at: www.lasemedinc.com
Posts.Title: LASER Cancer treatment Dr. IN USA KILL TUMORS INSTANTLY
